summary: An ordinance regulating and authorizing the licensing of certain "panoram" or "peepshow" devices; providing penalties; amending Section 11 and adding new sections to the License Code (Ordinance No. 48022) designated 330 through 330.7, inclusive, and repealing Ordinance No. 84065.
note: Ordinance includes Application form for licenses. Provides for censorship by police department of violence, obscenity, indecency, or immorality.
